.. _topics-index:

====================================================
Welcome to Clairvoyance |version|!
====================================================

Clairvoyance is a Auto-ML framework for medical time series prediction.


Installing
===========

Follow the installation guide :doc:`here <intro/install>`.

   :caption: First steps

   intro/install
   intro/tutorial


.. toctree::
   :caption: Full API reference

   api


Getting help
============

Having trouble? We'd like to help!
